											<h1 class="archive_title h2">
							<span>All About:</span><br />How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism						</h1>
						<p>An anti-monopolist critique of “surveillance capitalism,” that locates the problem with disinformation and conspiratorialism in the rise of monopolies. Just because Big Tech claims it has a mind control ray, we shouldn’t automatically believe them. <a href="https://onezero.medium.com/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-8135e6744d59">Read it for free</a> <a href="https://sowl.co/bm2F7c">Buy the ebook</a> <a href="https://bookshop.org/books/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism/9781736205907">Buy a print copy</a> <a href="https://framablog.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Doctorow-68p.pdf">French edition</a> <a href="https://dys2p.com/de/2021-04-how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism.html">German edition</a> <a href="http://www.hungry.com/~pere/publisher/2021-knus-overvaakningskapitalismen.html">Norwegian edition</a></p>

											  <article id="post-10406" class="clearfix post-10406 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-destroy category-news category-podcast" role="article">

  <header>

    <a href="https://craphound.com/nonficbooks/destroy/2021/05/17/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-part-07/" title="How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism (Part 07)"></a>

        <div class="page-header titleBox"><h1 class="h2"><a href="https://craphound.com/nonficbooks/destroy/2021/05/17/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-part-07/" rel="bookmark" title="How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism (Part 07)">How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism (Part 07)</a></h1></div>
    
    <p class="meta"><time datetime="21-05-17" pubdate>May 17, 2021</time> / <a href="https://craphound.com/author/cory-doctorow/" title="Posts by Cory Doctorow" rel="author">Cory Doctorow</a> / <a href="https://craphound.com/category/nonficbooks/destroy/" rel="category tag">How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism</a>, <a href="https://craphound.com/category/news/" rel="category tag">News</a>, <a href="https://craphound.com/category/podcast/" rel="category tag">Podcast</a></p>

  </header> <!-- end article header -->

  <section class="post_content clearfix">
    <p class="lead"><img decoding="async" src="https://i0.wp.com/craphound.com/images/survcap.jpeg?w=580&ssl=1" data-recalc-dims="1" data-lazy-src="https://i0.wp.com/craphound.com/images/survcap.jpeg?w=580&is-pending-load=1#038;ssl=1" srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" class=" jetpack-lazy-image"><noscript><img data-lazy-fallback="1" decoding="async" src="https://i0.wp.com/craphound.com/images/survcap.jpeg?w=580&ssl=1" data-recalc-dims="1" /></noscript></p>
<p>This week on my podcast, the conclusion to my seven-part serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book <a href="https://onezero.medium.com/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-8135e6744d59">How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism</a>, now available <a href="https://bookshop.org/books/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism/9781736205907">in paperback</a> (you can also order <a href="https://www.darkdel.com/store/p2024/Available_Now%3A__How_to_Destroy_Surveillance_Capitalism.html">signed and personalized copies</a> from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).</p>
<p><a href="https://archive.org/download/Cory_Doctorow_Podcast_389/Cory_Doctorow_Podcast_389_-_How_To_Destroy_Surveillance_Capitalism_07.mp3">MP3</a></p>
  </section> <!-- end article section -->

											  <article id="post-10404" class="clearfix post-10404 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-destroy category-news category-podcast" role="article">

  <header>

    <a href="https://craphound.com/nonficbooks/destroy/2021/05/10/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-part-06/" title="How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism (Part 06)"></a>

        <div class="page-header titleBox"><h1 class="h2"><a href="https://craphound.com/nonficbooks/destroy/2021/05/10/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-part-06/" rel="bookmark" title="How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism (Part 06)">How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism (Part 06)</a></h1></div>
    
    <p class="meta"><time datetime="21-05-10" pubdate>May 10, 2021</time> / <a href="https://craphound.com/author/cory-doctorow/" title="Posts by Cory Doctorow" rel="author">Cory Doctorow</a> / <a href="https://craphound.com/category/nonficbooks/destroy/" rel="category tag">How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism</a>, <a href="https://craphound.com/category/news/" rel="category tag">News</a>, <a href="https://craphound.com/category/podcast/" rel="category tag">Podcast</a></p>

  </header> <!-- end article header -->

  <section class="post_content clearfix">

<p>This week on my podcast, part one of a serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book <a href="https://onezero.medium.com/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-8135e6744d59">How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism</a>, now available <a href="https://bookshop.org/books/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism/9781736205907">in paperback</a> (you can also order <a href="https://www.darkdel.com/store/p2024/Available_Now%3A__How_to_Destroy_Surveillance_Capitalism.html">signed and personalized copies</a> from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).</p>

											  <article id="post-10329" class="clearfix post-10329 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-destroy category-news" role="article">

  <header>

    <a href="https://craphound.com/nonficbooks/destroy/2021/01/23/launching-a-print-edition-of-how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism/" title="Launching a print edition of HOW TO DESTROY SURVEILLANCE CAPITALISM"></a>

        <div class="page-header titleBox"><h1 class="h2"><a href="https://craphound.com/nonficbooks/destroy/2021/01/23/launching-a-print-edition-of-how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism/" rel="bookmark" title="Launching a print edition of HOW TO DESTROY SURVEILLANCE CAPITALISM">Launching a print edition of HOW TO DESTROY SURVEILLANCE CAPITALISM</a></h1></div>
    
    <p class="meta"><time datetime="21-01-23" pubdate>January 23, 2021</time> / <a href="https://craphound.com/author/cory-doctorow/" title="Posts by Cory Doctorow" rel="author">Cory Doctorow</a> / <a href="https://craphound.com/category/nonficbooks/destroy/" rel="category tag">How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism</a>, <a href="https://craphound.com/category/news/" rel="category tag">News</a></p>

  </header> <!-- end article header -->

  <section class="post_content clearfix">
    <p class="lead">Last August, Onezero published my first nonfiction book in nearly a decade: HOW TO DESTROY SURVEILLANCE CAPITALISM is a short book (or long pamphlet) that presents an anti-monopoly critique of the “surveillance capitalism” theory.</p>
<p><a href="https://onezero.medium.com/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-8135e6744d59">https://onezero.medium.com/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-8135e6744d59</a></p>
<p>The book’s a free online read, and now it’s a paper artifact. Next Thursday, Onezero will launch both a DRM-free ebook and print edition of my book, and to celebrate, I’m doing a online chat with OZ’s editor in chief, Damon Beres. It’s free to attend!</p>
<p><a href="https://medium.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GfnYHzZCSY-cCMVL5ZCDBw">https://medium.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GfnYHzZCSY-cCMVL5ZCDBw</a></p>
<p>The book’s main argument is that Big Tech lies about how good it is at manipulating us with data – that its dangerous manipulation doesn’t come through junk-science “big five personalities” and “sentiment analysis” but just from dominating and distorting our lives.</p>
<p>It’s a distinction with a difference. If these companies really can do effective, durable data-based psychological trickery then we probably shouldn’t break ’em up or force them to be interoperable.</p>
<p>The only thing scarier than being ruled over by five digital tyrants with mind-control rays is being terrorized by 5,000 loose cannons running around, each with their own data-based suitcase nuke.</p>
<p>But if these Big Tech giants are just old school monopolists who dress up their monopolistic tactics with a word-salad of statistical, psychological and computer science jargon, then hell yeah, we should just pull out some old school trustbusting sledgehammers and whack ’em.</p>
<p>With a new administration and a new tech agenda – which includes the most significant antitrust action in half a century – the book’s become especially salient. I’m really looking forward to my conversation with Damon – I hope you can make it!</p>
  </section> <!-- end article section -->

readabilityObject.title: How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism
readabilityObject.content:
May 17, 2021 / / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News, Podcast

This week on my podcast, the conclusion to my seven-part serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, now available in paperback (you can also order signed and personalized copies from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).

MP3

May 10, 2021 / Cory Doctorow / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News, Podcast

This week on my podcast, part six of a serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, now available in paperback (you can also order signed and personalized copies from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).

MP3

May 2, 2021 / Cory Doctorow / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News, Podcast

This week on my podcast, part five of a serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, now available in paperback (you can also order signed and personalized copies from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).

MP3

April 26, 2021 / Cory Doctorow / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News

Thanks to groups of German- and Norwegian-speaking volunteers, there’s now a CC-licensed Norwegian and German edition of How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism! They join the existing French edition.

/ Cory Doctorow / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News, Podcast

This week on my podcast, part four of a serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, now available in paperback (you can also order signed and personalized copies from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).

MP3

April 19, 2021 / Cory Doctorow / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News, Podcast

This week on my podcast, part three of a serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, now available in paperback (you can also order signed and personalized copies from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).

MP3

April 12, 2021 / Cory Doctorow / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News, Podcast

This week on my podcast, part two of a serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, now available in paperback (you can also order signed and personalized copies from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).

MP3

April 5, 2021 / Cory Doctorow / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News, Podcast

This week on my podcast, part one of a serialized reading of my 2020 Onezero/Medium book How To Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, now available in paperback (you can also order signed and personalized copies from Dark Delicacies, my local bookstore).

MP3

January 23, 2021 / Cory Doctorow / How to Destroy Surveillance Capitalism, News

Last August, Onezero published my first nonfiction book in nearly a decade: HOW TO DESTROY SURVEILLANCE CAPITALISM is a short book (or long pamphlet) that presents an anti-monopoly critique of the “surveillance capitalism” theory.

https://onezero.medium.com/how-to-destroy-surveillance-capitalism-8135e6744d59

The book’s a free online read, and now it’s a paper artifact. Next Thursday, Onezero will launch both a DRM-free ebook and print edition of my book, and to celebrate, I’m doing a online chat with OZ’s editor in chief, Damon Beres. It’s free to attend!

https://medium.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GfnYHzZCSY-cCMVL5ZCDBw

The book’s main argument is that Big Tech lies about how good it is at manipulating us with data – that its dangerous manipulation doesn’t come through junk-science “big five personalities” and “sentiment analysis” but just from dominating and distorting our lives.

It’s a distinction with a difference. If these companies really can do effective, durable data-based psychological trickery then we probably shouldn’t break ’em up or force them to be interoperable.

The only thing scarier than being ruled over by five digital tyrants with mind-control rays is being terrorized by 5,000 loose cannons running around, each with their own data-based suitcase nuke.

But if these Big Tech giants are just old school monopolists who dress up their monopolistic tactics with a word-salad of statistical, psychological and computer science jargon, then hell yeah, we should just pull out some old school trustbusting sledgehammers and whack ’em.

With a new administration and a new tech agenda – which includes the most significant antitrust action in half a century – the book’s become especially salient. I’m really looking forward to my conversation with Damon – I hope you can make it!
